The dead guy had become a haunting specter, a symbol of the fragility of life and the unpredictability of fate. As I prepared to face another day, I couldn't shake the feeling that the park held more secrets than I could ever uncover, and that somewhere, hidden among the trees and bushes, lay the truth about what had happened.
